thread.title: Britain's Aldbrough gas storage site outage extended to Friday
thread.title_full: Britain's Aldbrough gas storage site outage extended to Friday

title: Britain's Aldbrough gas storage site outage extended to Friday
text:
Tip : Use comma (,) to separate multiple quotes. Learn more... 
Thu, Aug 6, 2015, 20:37 BST - UK Markets closed Britain's Aldbrough gas storage site outage extended to Friday Reuters - UK Focus – 3 hours ago 1,540.00 +12.00 
LONDON, Aug 6 (Reuters) - An unplanned outage at Britain's Aldbrough gas storage site has been extended to Friday at 1000 local time (0900 GMT), operator SSE (LSE: SSE.L - news ) said on Thursday. 
The outage, reducing the deliverability of gas by 81.7 gigawatt hours, started in the early hours of Thursday and had been due to come back online on Thursday evening. (Reporting by Nina Chestney; Editing by Susan Fenton) Tax cuts, pensions, childcare, online accounts and beer duty, here's … Related Stock Articles Follow the quotes you care about most.
